original_text: And so in the matter of the envoys of the princes of Babylon, who had been sent to him to inquire about the sign that had been done in the land, God left him to himself, in order to test him and to know all that was in his heart.
korean_text: 그러나 바벨론 방백들이 히스기야에게 사신을 보내어 그 땅에서 나타난 이적을 물을 때에 하나님이 히스기야를 떠나시고 그의 심중에 있는 것을 다 알고자 하사 시험하셨더라

sentences.original_text: And so in the matter of the envoys of the princes of Babylon
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 바빌론 왕들의 사신들에 관한 일에 있어서

sentences.original_text: who had been sent to him
that had been done in the land
and to know all that was in his heart
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 마음에 있는 모든 것을 알고자 하심이라
